text: Dogu madagoaa nogo i baahi digaula, Au nogo benebene digaula i nia mahi o do ingoo, go di ingoo dela ne gaamai Kooe gi di Au. Au nogo madamada humalia i digaula, tangada digaula ne ngala ai, dela hua go tangada dela gu haga ingoo bolo e ngala, gii donu ai nia helekai o di Beebaa Dabu.17.12 Pisalem 41.9; John 13.18
